text: Patrick M. Byrne (born 1962, Fort Wayne, Indiana, United States) is the CEO and chairman of Overstock.com. He took control of the company in 1999. He had previously lead two smaller companies, including one owned by Warren Buffettâ€™s Berkshire Hathaway.Riding on a Raft: Patrick Byrne and Overstock.com, by Duan, Jason, Bachelor, John A III. title: Patrick M. Byrne
